participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic, always looking for new outdoor challenges.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and knowledgeable, with a deep love for literature and a reflective perspective on life.
participant_2.background: i'm a librarian. i am 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years.
